ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | uc1pn0.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | uc1pn0.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` P ) |
| 3 |  | uc1pn0.c | |- C = ( Unic1p ` R ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` P ) = ( Base ` P ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( deg1 ` R ) = ( deg1 ` R ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Unit ` R ) = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 7 | 1, 4, 2, 5, 3, 6 | #P_isuc1p | |- ( F e. C <-> ( F e. ( Base ` P ) /\ F =/= .0. /\ ( ( coe1 ` F ) ` ( ( deg1 ` R ) ` F ) ) e. ( Unit ` R ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_simp2bi | |- ( F e. C -> F =/= .0. ) |
